channel.title: Abouts on Razor's Edge
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Razor's Edge

item.title: What is this?
item.description: You’ve landed on my site. Aloha. This is an experiment. This is where I am posting updates and ideas that come to me. Where are we? How did we get here? I am a world citizen, currently based in Bali, Indonesia. I’ve spent most of my post-university years in Hawai’i and California with meaningful episodes in Beijing, NYC, Shanghai, and Bogota. In my past, I have done many things to make a living.
